mapper.insert: INSERT INTO heartbeat_table (device_id, imei_code, data_length, function_code, current_newtime, crc8 ) VALUES (#{id}, #{imeiCode}, #{dataLength}, #{functionCode}, #{time}, #{crc8} )

INSERT INTO location (locationId, deviceId, locationType, locationLongitude, locationLatitude, locationSpeed, locationDirection, locationAltitude, locationPower, locationTime, serverTime, regionNumber ) VALUES (#{locationId}, #{deviceId}, #{locationType}, #{locationLongitude}, #{locationLatitude}, #{locationSpeed}, #{locationDirection}, #{locationAltitude}, #{locationElectricity}, #{locationTime}, #{serverTime}, #{regionNumber} )
